content.text: Our Implementation team can use this import to populate the PMs.
Do not change the column headers in Row 1 as this is used to complete the upload.

Maintenance Plan - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters - Assets that get associated at this level will automatically be assigned all PMs tied to this MP. PMs can also be linked together within a maintenance plans so tasks carry over between them.
PM - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters - The frequency of maintenance and specific tasks are associated at the PM level
Service Task - Required field with maximum length of 24 characters - Specific items to be checked off by technician during preventive maintenance
